name: 彭祖乙
objective:
物聯網系統包含了感測器與感測網路，邊緣閘道，雲端服務與存取裝置，可建構眾多的端到端商業應用包含無人商店與智慧支付的場景金融，遠距醫療與照護，智慧製造與智慧家庭等。本課程將教授物聯網系統的設計包含裝置與服務的技術，並以各項商業應用場景做課題的探討。
The Internet of Things (IoT) system encompasses sensors and sensor networks, IoT gateways, cloud services, and mobile devices, enabling the development of numerous end-to-end business applications, including scenarios such as unmanned stores, and intelligent payment in the financial sector, remote healthcare and caregiving, smart manufacturing, and smart homes. This course will teach the design of IoT systems, including device and service technologies, and explore various business application scenarios as topics of discussion.
schedule:
week 1   Course Introduction 
week 2   IoT technology introduction
week 3   IoT Business Applications
week 4-6  IoT Devices development
week 7-8  IoT Service development (1)
week 9  Mid-term report
week10-11    IoT Service development (2)
week 12-16   IoT Business Application Topics
week   17-18  Group project presentation
